about.title: About Us
about.heading: Commitment to the intransigent defense of constitutional guarantees.
about.description1: Dinoermeson Nascimento Law Firm is born from the commitment to the intransigent defense of constitutional guarantees, legality and human dignity. We act strategically, technically and personalized, offering close and responsible service to each client.
about.description2: The firm has a strong performance in defending military police officers, public security agents and citizens subjected to complex criminal processes, as well as strategic demands involving freedom, honor and fundamental rights.
about.missionText: Practice law with technical excellence, courage and responsibility, defending fundamental rights and ensuring justice.
about.visionText: To be a regional reference in criminal and military law, recognized for technical quality and ethical performance.
about.valuesText: Ethics, Legality, Loyalty to the client, Intransigent defense of constitutional guarantees, Commitment to justice.
about.differentiator4: Strong experience in sensitive and highly complex cases
about.differentiator5: Technical defense with clear and objective language

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Partners and Legal Team
team.description: Dinoermeson Nascimento Law Firm has a multidisciplinary and specialist legal team, offering direct service by responsible partners in each case.
team.multidisciplinaryText: Our technical team is composed of professionals specialized in various areas of law, ensuring a complete and strategic vision for each case. We work in an integrated way to offer effective and personalized legal solutions.

dinoermeson.name: Dr. Dinoermeson Tiago dos Santos Nascimento
dinoermeson.description: Nearly two decades of professional experience. Specialist in Criminal Law, Criminal Procedure, Military Criminal Law, Military Criminal Procedure and Legal Medicine.

dinoermeson.achievement3: Former Vice-President of the Special Commission on Military Law of OAB/BA
dinoermeson.achievement4: Former member of the Human Rights Commission of OAB/BA

ailton.name: Dr. Ailton Nascimento Júnior
ailton.description: Postgraduate in Military Law. Strategic performance in civil, business and labor areas.

practiceAreas.title: Practice Areas
practiceAreas.description: Multidisciplinary and specialized performance to offer complete and effective legal solutions.
practiceAreas.criminalDesc: Defense in police inquiries and criminal actions, acting in common and complex crimes with strategy and technique. Performance in all procedural phases, from the investigative phase to appeals in Superior Courts.
practiceAreas.militaryDesc: Specialists in the defense of military police, military firefighters and public security agents in administrative and judicial processes. Performance in Military Police Inquiries (IPM), Disciplinary Councils and proper and improper military crimes.

militaryDetails.1: Defense of Military Police and Firefighters

practiceAreas.juryDesc: More than 100 trials conducted. Technical performance, forensic oratory and mastery of trial psychology. Specialization in intentional crimes against life, complex and media-related cases.
practiceAreas.civilDesc: Strategic advisory for large companies, legal risk management and civil litigation. Performance in civil liability, contracts and strategic demands.
practiceAreas.taxDesc: Administrative and judicial defense in tax matters for national and international companies. Performance in federal, state and municipal taxes.
practiceAreas.laborDesc: Business defense and preventive consulting on labor issues. Strategic performance in labor demands and structuring of labor relations.
practiceAreas.consumerDesc: Judicial and administrative defense of companies and risk management in consumer relations. Preventive and contentious performance.
practiceAreas.familyDesc: Succession planning, structuring of business families and divorces with business impact. Strategic performance in family matters involving business assets.
practiceAreas.publicDesc: Advisory to Municipalities, States and Public Agents. Administrative acts, legality control and defense in public nature actions.

superiorCourts.title: Superior Courts
superiorCourts.description: Specialized performance before the Federal Supreme Court (STF) and Superior Court of Justice (STJ), with expertise in special appeals, extraordinary appeals and actions of a constitutional nature.
superiorCourts.heading: Performance before STF and STJ

stf.title: Federal Supreme Court (STF)
stf.description: Performance in extraordinary appeals, direct actions of unconstitutionality, habeas corpus and other processes under STF jurisdiction.
stf.item2: Habeas Corpus in cases of great repercussion

stj.title: Superior Court of Justice (STJ)
stj.description: Performance in special appeals, habeas corpus and other processes under STJ jurisdiction, focusing on jurisprudence uniformity and protection of fundamental rights.

cta.title: Protection of Fundamental Rights
cta.description: Our performance in Superior Courts has as its main objective the protection of fundamental rights, the reversal of unfair decisions and the recognition of nullities that violate constitutional guarantees.

jury.title: Jury Court & Plenary Advocacy
jury.description1: Performance in the Jury Court constitutes one of the central pillars of the firm. More than two decades of continuous experience and more than 100 trials conducted.
jury.description2: Specialization in intentional crimes against life, complex and media cases, with mastery of procedural technique, forensic oratory and trial psychology.
jury.strategyText: Development of personalized strategies for each case, considering procedural particularities and nuances of applicable material law.
jury.oratoryText: Mastery of forensic oratory, with the ability to communicate clearly, objectively and persuasively before the jury plenary.
jury.techniqueText: Deep knowledge of jury procedural technique, with attention to details that can make a difference in the final result.

enterprises.ctaText: Contact us to learn how we can help your company with strategic legal advisory, specialized litigation and legal risk management.
